title: ORACC
description: You just won Oracc! Prepare for Sumerian fun and Jython. A lot of Jython.
effect: Keep this card. No other events can make you lose this card.

title: Zacros
description: You just won Zacros! Modern Fortran can be so much fun. Really!
effect: Keep this card. If you get the Fortran curse, it will be amplified, and you'll have to lose 2 rounds instead of 1.

title: Critical Care
description: You just won Critical Care! Explore the rabbit hole of hospital data.
effect: Keep this card. Counts as 3 projects for "Funding confirmed!"

title: CloudLabs
description: CloudLabs just got funded! Azure, ITCPD and ISD Architects, what could go wrong?

title: Research Software Dashboard
description: Dashboard just got funded! Software might one day be as recognised as papers. Maybe.

title: ShipViz
description: You just won ShipViz! Ships and maps, Raquel will love this.
effect: Keep this card. Raquel's card has no effect.

title: BICO
description: You just won BICO! Get ready for clear skies and MPI madness.

title: HHPredY
description: You just won HHPredY! And all of the yeast's secrets shall be revealled.

title: FASt-Mal
description: You just won FASt-Mal! Will AI be better at diagnosing Malaria than clinicians?
effect: Keep this card. Truce with CS! The Cold War has no effect.

title: HemeLB
description: You just won HemeLB! You're modelling vascular bloodflow, but what about the edge cases?

title: EPPI Reviewer
description: You just won EPPI Reviewer! Hold on, what's CSLA again? You just lost EPPI Reviewer.
effect: Keep for 2 turns. Then, discard this card.

title: Eyeballs
description: You just won a project with Moorfields Eye Hospital!

title: BEM++ Science Gateway
description: You just won... err... some project with... someone?

title: Web Lab
description: You just won Web Lab! Jonathan gets distracted being a PI.
effect: Keep this card. Jonathan's ability has no effect.
